deep.comment: Deep z-index is used to stack something behind everything else.

default.comment: The default z-index for components and elements inside components.

masked.comment: Default z-index for masked interface elements.

mask.comment: Default z-index for masking interface elements.

sticky.comment: Default z-index for sticky interface elements.

popup.comment: Default z-index for popups that stacks on top of all other elements.

modal.comment: Default z-index for modals that stacks on top of overlays and other elements, but still allows popups to be visible.

toast.comment: Default z-index for toast and snackbar messages.
